definitions.text:
forsworn. See Swear and Answer.]
1. To reject renounce upon oath.
2. To deny upon oath.Like innocence, and as serenely bold as truth, how loudly he forswears thy gold.To forswear one's self, is to falsely; to perjure one's self.Thou shalt not forswear thyself. Matthew 5:33.FORSWEAR,
